# Operators and Expressions

- [Arithmetic Operators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/arithmetic-operators.md): Learn more about: Arithmetic Operators in Visual Basic
- [Boolean Expressions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/boolean-expressions.md): Learn more about: Boolean Expressions (Visual Basic)
- [Common Tasks Performed with Visual Basic Operators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/common-tasks-performed-with-visual-basic-operators.md): Learn more about: Common Tasks Performed with Visual Basic Operators
- [Comparison Operators (Visual Basic)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/comparison-operators.md): Learn more about: Comparison Operators in Visual Basic
- [Concatenation Operators in Visual Basic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/concatenation-operators.md): Learn more about: Concatenation Operators in Visual Basic
- [Efficient Combination of Operators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/efficient-combination-of-operators.md): Learn more about: Efficient Combination of Operators (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Calculate Numeric Values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/how-to-calculate-numeric-values.md): Learn more about: How to: Calculate Numeric Values (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Match a String against a Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/how-to-match-a-string-against-a-pattern.md): Learn more about: How to: Match a String against a Pattern (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Test Whether Two Objects Are the Same](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/how-to-test-whether-two-objects-are-the-same.md): Learn more about: How to: Test Whether Two Objects Are the Same (Visual Basic)
